amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-786 to reward the elimination of lionfish from United States waters by allowing individuals to exchange lionfish for tags authorizing fishing for certain species in addition to the number of such species otherwise authorized to be taken by such individuals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Gaetz amendment (A011) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A011) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
